text:
Created attachment 33378
Screenshots

I want to load test on chat application which is built on following technologies:

Front End --> Asp.net c# and javascript, jquery, html
Back end chat server --> node js and socket.io, redis
Database--> SQL server

I am not able to login properly due to Jmeter not able to communicate with Node.js
Please find attached screenshots which might help you to identify issue.
Let me know if you need more information from my side.

Please resolve my this issue so I can start my Load testing with Jmeter.
